sources.title: New Mexico
sources.description: Captain Hunt (Lew Ayres) of the cavalry is trying to promote good relations with the Indian chief Acoma (Ted de Corsia). But Hunt's superiors in the military insist on pursuing policies that will provoke a conflict, and Chief Acoma is not willing to let himself be insulted.

sources.title: New Mexico (1951) WESTERN
sources.description:
Stars: Lew Ayres, Marilyn Maxwell, Robert Hutton
 Director: Irving Reis

 A cavalry captain has great difficulty keeping the peace between his tyrannical colonel and an Indian chief bent on revenge

metadata.Plot: Captain Hunt of the cavalry is trying to promote good relations with the Indian chief Acoma. But Hunt's superiors in the military insist on pursuing policies that will provoke a conflict, and Chief Acoma is not willing to let himself be insulted.
metadata.Actors: Lew Ayres, Marilyn Maxwell, Andy Devine
